com.viaoa.web.html.form

Class OAForm

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.viaoa.web.server.OABase
      • com.viaoa.web.html.form.OAForm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class OAForm
extends OABase
implements Serializable
    Controls an html form and it's components Form submission support for multipart messages, errorMessage, hiddenMessages default forwardUrl send script to page (addScript) manage ajax or regular submit Multiple stage handling for submits, with event.
    Author:
    vvia
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • setCallbackMs

        public void setCallbackMs(int ms)
        If requestAjaxCallback is true, then this is the amount of time(ms) before browser will call the server. default is 2500 (ms)
        Parameters:
        ms - miliseconds

      • readNextMultiPartValue

        protected boolean readNextMultiPartValue(BufferedReader br,
                                         BufferedOutputStream bos,
                                         String boundary)
                                  throws IOException
        Writes all data to bos, up to the boundary, and then skips to the end of the boundry, and reads 2 chars to determine if there are addition parts.
        Returns:
        true if there are more parts read, false if this was the last part.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • processGetJson

        public String processGetJson(OASession session)
                      throws Exception
        This is used for a http (or ajax) request go directly to a component for processing.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • processForward

        public String processForward(OASession session,
                             javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                             javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Called by oaforward.jsp to be able to have a component submit method called, without doing a form submit.
